fullText: This exuberantly theatrical production of Shakespeare's romantic comedy proves that star power and directorial flair can work enchanting magic even on familiar material.
dtliExcerpt: This exuberantly theatrical production of Shakespeare's romantic comedy proves that star power and directorial flair can work enchanting magic even on familiar material.
